fields.title: What is Turkcell Container Platform?
fields.text: Turkcell Container Platform is an aPaaS platform that powers Kubernetes, It is built around a core of Docker container packaging and Kubernetes container cluster management, Turkcell Container Platform is also augmented by application lifecycle management functionality and DevOps tooling. It provides a complete open source container application platform.

fields.title: What is Kubernetes?
fields.text: Kubernetes is an open-source system for automating deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications. It groups containers that make up an application into logical units for easy management and discovery. Kubernetes builds upon 15 years of experience of running production workloads at Google, combined with best-of-breed ideas and practices from the community.
